messages.zh: 第一关（前）
messages.en: Before Clear GT-1
...So hot...
It hurts...

messages.zh: 这女人，还不肯说吗？
messages.en: This woman is still not talking?

messages.zh: 好渴......喉咙像是被火烤着......
messages.en: My throat is on fire...
...How long has it been...

messages.zh: 真厉害啊，都被吊在这一天多了，真亏她能忍得住啊。
messages.en: Gotta hand it to her, she can endure being hang out here for a day.

messages.zh: 喂，你们可别把她搞死了，宝藏的位置她还没说呢！
messages.en: Hey, you don’t want her to end up dead! She still hasn’t told us where the treasure is!
I... I will never tell you...

messages.zh: 别给她水喝，直到她说了为止！
messages.en: Don’t give her any water until she tell us where it is!
Will... I die?

messages.zh: 没想到就算到了卡西米尔。
messages.en: I didn’t expect coming to Casimir

messages.zh: 胡作非为的歹徒也是哪里都有。
messages.en: only to see criminals running amok.

messages.zh: 嗯？哪里来的家伙，不想活了吗？
messages.en: Eh? Where did you come from? Do you have a death wish?

messages.zh: 喂，小子，你赶紧给我——
messages.en: Hey little guy, hurry and get out --

messages.zh: 唔，好，好疼。
messages.en: Urgh... p-painful.

messages.zh: 仔细看，他这身装扮......不像是当地人啊。
messages.en: Look carefully at that outfit, he doesn’t seem like the locals.

messages.zh: 管他是哪里来的！他就一个人，不过是来送死的！
messages.en: Who cares! It’s just one guy who's coming to die here!

messages.zh: 所以，得把你们全部解决掉才行？
messages.en: So I have to get rid of you then?

messages.zh: 噗啊！
messages.en: Urgh!
Argh!

messages.zh: 好了，他们一时半会还醒不过来，我们赶紧离开这里。
messages.en: Okay, they won’t wake up for a while. Let’s get out of here.
You... You are?

messages.zh: 别怕，没有人能再伤害你了，我会带你离开。
messages.en: Don’t be afraid, no one can hurt you anymore, I’ll take you away from here.
I apologize, my head…. Is dizzy.

messages.zh: 你脸色不太好。没关系，让我抱着你。
messages.en: You don’t look so good. It’s alright, I’ll carry you. Hold on tight.

messages.zh: 请抓紧了。
messages.en: Please hurry up.

messages.zh: 晴 \ 能见度 14公里
messages.en: Sunny\Visibility 14 KM

messages.zh: 某村庄内
messages.en: In a village

messages.zh: 你有没有看到一个拿长枪的小子？
messages.en: Did you see a fellow holding a spear?

messages.zh: 我一直待在家里，外面发生什么我不知道。
messages.en: I've been staying at home, I don’t what happened outside.

messages.zh: 要是让我知道你窝藏了他们，有你好看的！
messages.en: If I know you’re hiding them, you’ll pay for it!

messages.zh: 那群家伙已经离开了，格拉尼骑警小姐，你们可以从壁橱里出来了。
messages.en: They have left. Miss Grani, you can come out of the closet now.
Hah~!

messages.zh: 又被大叔帮了大忙啊。
messages.en: Thanks uncle, you helped us out big time.

messages.zh: 可萝尔你没事吧？真是苦了你了。
messages.en: Are you alright Carol? It must be so hard on you.

messages.zh: 卢克大叔，多谢你，我现在好多了。
messages.en: Thank you uncle Luke, I feel better now.

messages.zh: 因为有大家的帮助，我才能救出你。
messages.en: It’s all thanks to everyone that I can rescue you.

messages.zh: 可萝尔，不要担心！
messages.en: Miss Carol, please don’t worry.

messages.zh: 骑士小姐已经和我们商量好了！她一定会拯救整个村子的！
messages.en: The lady knight has made an arrangement with us! She will save the village!

messages.zh: 啊？小姐？
messages.en: Huh? Lady knight?

messages.zh: 这，是啊，我是女孩子啊。
messages.en: Well, yeah, I’m a girl...

messages.zh: 啊？
messages.en: Huh?

messages.zh: 唔！就算是我，也是有女孩子的自尊心的！
messages.en: Hey, even I have a girl’s self-esteem!

messages.zh: 欸、欸，对不起。
messages.en: Eh… Eh… I’m sorry.

messages.zh: 虽然看穿着不像......
messages.en: While you don’t look the part...

messages.zh: 请问，您是......新受封的卡西米尔骑士大人吗？
messages.en: May I ask? Are you a newly knighted Casimir knight?

messages.zh: 在您解救我们村子之后，会向我们征税吗？
messages.en: After you freed our village, will we have to pay taxes to you?

messages.zh: 不不不，我可并不是卡西米尔人，更不是什么骑士。
messages.en: No, No, No, I’m not a Casimir, much less a knight.

messages.zh: 虽然维多利亚也有骑士，但我之前是骑警啦！
messages.en: While Victoria does have knights, I used to be police.

messages.zh: 骑警和骑士不一样，是公务治安职务。骑警做事，不图回报，可不会向你们征什么税！
messages.en: Unlike a knight, it is our duty to protect and serve! We expect no return for our service. There will be no tax on you!

messages.zh: 维多利亚？
messages.en: Victoria?

messages.zh: 是在卡西米尔外面的地方，我的祖辈也都是从卡西米尔迁到那里去的库兰塔人。
messages.en: It’s outside of Casimir, my ancestors were Kuranta too, who had moved there from Casimir.

messages.zh: 这次接到了你们的委托，也是想来卡西米尔看一看，父母的家乡是什么样......没想到会是这么严重的事态。
messages.en: I received your request, and I wanted to come and see what it was like in Casimir, the place of my parents homeland, I didn’t expect to see such a serious situation.

messages.zh: ......我本来以为，交给信使的那些委托信都石沉大海了。
messages.en: I always thought… those letters I entrusted to the messengers... have fallen on deaf ears.

messages.zh: 毕竟那些民间互助组织从来不会在意我们这偏僻的地方。
messages.en: After all, those civilian mutual aid organization never cared for our remote village.

messages.zh: 不过，为什么卡西米尔政府没有伸出援手？
messages.en: What about the Casimir government? Why aren’t they giving you help?

messages.zh: 哼......首都的骑士大人们怎么会关注我们这种偏远的村子？
messages.en: ....Why would the knights from the capital care about a village as remote as ours?

messages.zh: 正因如此，许多年来，我们反而过得很安稳，城市里动荡不安的生活也不怎么吸引我们。
messages.en: As a result, for many years, we lived in peace and stability. The turbulence life in the city hardly appealed to us.

messages.zh: 滴水村的人们世世代代都在这片山区附近居住。
messages.en: The people of Droplet town have lived here near the mountainous region for generations.

messages.zh: 尽管生活没那么富裕，但至少我们可以自给自足。
messages.en: Though we don’t live in luxury, at least we are self-sufficient.

messages.zh: 虽然有时候会为了躲避天灾暂时迁走村庄，但这里毕竟还是我们的家园。
messages.en: While there are times where we must temporarily move the village to escape natural disaster, this is still our home.

messages.zh: 所以，我们无法割舍这片土地......
messages.en: We cannot cede this land.

messages.zh: 但是现在，村子却被那些赏金猎人破坏得满目疮痍——
messages.en: But now this village is devastated by the bounty hunters..

messages.zh: ......都是因为那个骑士宝藏。
messages.en: ...All because of the knight’s treasure.

messages.zh: 最近几年，附近的几个村落都成了赏金猎人们常常光顾的地方。
messages.en: In recent years, several nearby villages have become frequent spot for bounty hunters.

messages.zh: 好像是，卡西米尔北部控制区常有动乱什么的，所以不断有赏金猎人去那里寻找发财的机会，而我们滴水村位于通往北方的必经之路上。
messages.en: It seems like there is a lot of unrest in the north of Casimir, so bounty hunters kept going there looking for opportunities to make money, and our village is the only main way to the north.

messages.zh: 本来村子就经常会有赏金猎人出入，但是也没有造成什么危害。
messages.en: The village was frequented by bounty hunters, but there was no harm done at first.

messages.zh: 直到一个月前，有一伙赏金猎人在山中挖出了一位随从骑士的石棺，还翻出了一小箱陪葬的金币......
messages.en: It wasn't until a month ago that a group of bounty hunters dug up a sarcophagus in the mountains of an attendant knight. They found a small chest of gold coins that had been buried with him.

messages.zh: 是这种印着卡西米尔徽章的金币吧？
messages.en: These gold coins with Casimir insignia on them?

messages.zh: 我刚来这里就有赏金猎人跑来找麻烦，这几枚金币，算做他们举止粗鲁的赔礼。
messages.en: When I first came here, I had some bounty hunters looking for trouble with me. These gold coins were an apology for their rude behavior.

messages.zh: 嗯......就是这些金币，在赏金猎人之间带出了一段传说，也给我们带来了大麻烦。
messages.en: Yes, it is indeed those gold coins, which led to a legend among bounty hunters that caused us great trouble.

messages.zh: “卡西米尔的每位古代骑士会带着他们的精神与财富，下葬于其家乡的无名之地，并永世保护着这片土地。”
messages.en: “Each of the ancient knights of Casimir would bring their spirit and wealth to be buried in the nameless land of their hometown and protect it forever.”

messages.zh: “只有来自不惧牺牲，无畏艰险的卡西米尔血脉才能破除所有的阻碍。”
messages.en: “Only the Casimir blood, unafraid of sacrifice, unafraid of danger, can overcome all obstacles.”

messages.zh: 这样的传说被传得越来越远，附近的赏金猎人变得越来越多。
messages.en: Such tales spread far and wide, and the bounty hunters became more numerous.

messages.zh: 最初，赏金猎人还只是讨论如何寻找更大的骑士宝藏，可后来“滴水村有人知道骑士宝藏下落”的消息却不知怎么的越传越开——
messages.en: At first, the bounty hunters were only discussing how to find a larger Knights treasure, but later, the rumor of “Someone in Droplet town knows the whereabouts of the Knights treasure”. somehow spread far and wide.

messages.zh: ————嘘！大家先别说话！
messages.en: Shhh! Hold your voice!

messages.zh: 不行，找不到他们，给我从头再搜一遍！
messages.en: No, If you can't find them, search them all over again!

messages.zh: 继续待在这里不太安全，不能拖累这位大叔。
messages.en: It's not safe to stay here. We can’t drag uncle Luke into this.

messages.zh: 总之，我们先离开这里。
messages.en: Anyway, let's get out of here.

messages.zh: 你们要小心点自己的安全，骑士......不对，骑警小姐，村长就交给你了！
messages.en: Watch your safety, knights... No, Miss police, please take care of the village chief.

messages.zh: 大叔，你放心，我一定保护好——
messages.en: Do not worry uncle Luke, I will take care of --

messages.zh: 啊？村长？
messages.en: Wait, village chief?

messages.zh: ......滴水村村长可萝尔，虽然上任才半年，就算是我，也是有村长的自尊心的哦。
messages.en: Carol, the village chief of Droplet town. Although I have been in office for only half a year, even I have the pride of a village head.
